data.title: NCT electronics, with housing, mounted on AT9014-1070-1550 mover (mover 1), basic electronics
data.meta_description: The NCT electronics form the basis for an application-specific adaptation of the NCT technology in third-party applications. In combination with a housing...
data.text: The NCT electronics form the basis for an application-specific adaptation of the NCT technology in third-party applications. In combination with a housing unit, an XTS mover and the AT2100 or AT2102 motor modules, a regulated 24Â V DC power supply and synchronous real-time data communication are available on the movers. The basic electronics used already offer a wide range of options for integrating sensors and actuators â digital inputs and outputs, analog inputs and PWM outputs. The basic functionalities can be complemented with application-dependent electronics. All functions can be controlled centrally via TwinCAT, ensuring high usability with short training times.
